short.hi: ट्विटर के लिए उपयोगी छोटी सुविधाएँ।
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Pequenos recursos úteis para o Twitter.
short.th: คุณสมบัติเล็ก ๆ น้อย ๆ ที่เป็นประโยชน์สำหรับ Twitter

long.ar,de,es,fr,hi,ja,ko,nl,no,pt_BR,pt_PT,r:
Recall tweets you were writing on Twitter before accidentally hitting the back button, your electricity went out, or any number of reasons they get lost.

Quick access to useful symbols such as ¼
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Prevents lost Twitter tweet writing. Recall tweets you were writing before accidentally hitting the back button, your electricity went out, or any number of reasons they get lost.

Quick access to useful symbols such as ¼ and ☼
